com.apm.core.utils

Class AnimateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.apm.core.utils.AnimateUtils

  • public class AnimateUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Ing. Oscar G. Medina Cruz on 14/12/15. Create and personalize animations based on Android Animation class, or use Animation resource.

    • Method Detail

      • AnimateView

        public static void AnimateView(android.content.Context context,
                               android.view.View viewToAnim,
                               boolean hideAtEnd,
                               boolean isInvisible,
                               int animResource)
        Animate view using animation resource
        Parameters:
        context - current application context
        viewToAnim - view that plays animation
        hideAtEnd - if the view will hide when the animation finishes
        isInvisible - if the view current visibility state is invisible
        animResource - animation resource id

      • AnimateView

        public static void AnimateView(android.content.Context context,
                               android.view.View viewToAnim,
                               boolean hideAtEnd,
                               boolean isInvisible,
                               int overrideDuration,
                               int animResource)
        Animate view using animation resource
        Parameters:
        context - current application context
        viewToAnim - view that plays animation
        hideAtEnd - if the view will hide when the animation finishes
        isInvisible - if the view current visibility state is invisible
        overrideDuration - if we need other duration than the stablished in animation resource
        animResource - animation resource id

      • AnimateView

        public static void AnimateView(android.content.Context context,
                               android.view.View viewToAnim,
                               int animResource,
                               android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener animationListener)
        Animate view using animation resource and using custom animation listener
        Parameters:
        context - current application context
        viewToAnim - view tat plays animation
        animResource - animation resource
        animationListener - custom animation event listener

      • ScaleIn

        public static void ScaleIn(android.view.View viewToAnim,
                           int startOffset,
                           int duration,
                           boolean visibleAtEnd,
                           boolean isInvisible)
        Scale in animation, optimizing visibility state and animation parameters
        Parameters:
        viewToAnim - view that plays animation
        visibleAtEnd - if the view will show when the animation finishes
        isInvisible - if the view current visibility state is invisible
        startOffset - start offset of the animation
        duration - animation duration

      • ScaleIn

        public static void ScaleIn(android.view.View viewToAnim,
                           int startOffset,
                           int duration,
                           int relativeToValue,
                           float pivotX,
                           float pivotY,
                           android.view.animation.Animation.AnimationListener animationListener)
        Scale in animation, optimizing visibility state and animation parameters, and declaring pivot points for the animation
        Parameters:
        viewToAnim - view that plays animation
        startOffset - start offset of the animation
        duration - animation duration
        relativeToValue - relative point to the animation
        pivotX - pivot point at x axis
        pivotY - pivot point at y axis
        animationListener - custom animation event listener

        Build scale out animation, optimizing visibility state and animation parameters, and declaring pivot points for the animation
        Parameters:
        startOffset - start offset of the animation
        duration - animation duration
        fromValue - start value of animation (Scale width, scale height)
        toValue - end value of animation (Scale width, scale height)
        relativeToValue - relative point to the animation
        pivotX - pivot point at x axis
        pivotY - pivot point at y axis
        interpolator - custom animation interpolator
        animationListener - custom animation event listener
        Returns:
        ScaleOutAnimation

                          int duration,

                          float toDegrees)

        fillAfter - if the view preserve the final state of the animation
        startOffset - start offset of the animation
        duration - animation duration
        fromDegrees - initial degrees of animation
        toDegrees - final degrees of animation
